product_name: Royal Robbins Ensenada Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Spend your summer days outside strolling the boardwalk in the comfortable linen/rayon Royal Robbins Ensenada Shorts. Linen gives the shorts a natural look and good breathability; rayon adds softness and wrinkle- and shrink-resistance. UPF 30 sun protection. Hand pockets, rear pockets with rip-and-stick closures and a drop-in cell phone pocket with snap closure provide plenty of space for essentials. Royal Robbins Ensenada Shorts have a regular fit with a 13 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Spend your summer days outside strolling the boardwalk in the comfortable linen/rayon Royal Robbins Ensenada Shorts.
